context.p: To create a report using data on the Cloud Controller (CLC):

step.cmd: Click the Usage Report link in the Resource Management section.

choices.choice: Enter the starting date in the From field.
Enter the end date in the Through field.
Enter the report type you want to generate in the Report type field.

step.stepresult: The report displays on the screen.

taskbody.postreq: To download the report, click the CSV or HTML icon at the bottom of the screen.
